price: Sila gara gaalaa akkamitti akka uumamte hin ilaalanuu?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
